Detailed Description

This class is a simple base class for classes that want to own a channel.

Member Function Documentation

void Mercury::ChannelOwner::addr ( const Address &  addr  ) 

This method switches this ChannelOwner to a different address.

We can't simply call through to Channel::addr() because there might already be an anonymous channel to that address. We need to look it up and claim the anonymous one if it already exists.
